name: Salomon Cross Hike Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes - Women's
categories: Cross Hike Gore-Tex Light Trail Shoes
description: With features taken from Salomon's popular trail running shoes, the Cross Hike is built to take on the mountains with speed. A high-rebound midsole provide cushion and stability on uneven terrain, and an aggressive sole keeps you tractioned, no matter what Mother Nature throws at you.Seamless synthetic upper with a water-repellent finish.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® bootie lets you tackle wet conditions.Protective overlays protect from abrasion and trail debris.Removable OrthoLite® footbed cushions feet for long days on the trail.EnergyCell™+ midsole combines cushioning and support.Non-marking Contagrip® rubber outsole is durable for long-term wear.Deep Chevron lugs provide multi-directional grip on soft surfaces.
